name: Hopium Hydrogen Car
information: The Hopium Hydrogen Car is an innovative hydrogen fuel cell-powered sedan that offers a luxurious driving experience with cutting-edge technology.

name: hyperionx
information: The HyperionX is a cutting-edge hydrogen fuel cell and electric hybrid SUV, blending sustainability with luxury and performance.

name: pininfarina X
information: HydroSport X is a high-performance hydrogen-powered sports car for enthusiasts.

name: NAMX
information: The NAMX is a compact electric car designed for urban mobility, known for its energy efficiency and sleek design.

name: VW XL1
information: The VW XL1 is a highly fuel-efficient plug-in hybrid compact car designed for eco-conscious urban commuters.

name: HUMMER H2 Hydro
information: The HUMMER H2 Hydro is a rugged and powerful pickup truck featuring a hydrogen fuel cell system, making it an eco-friendly off-road beast.
